JobFullDesc: In People & Places, we handle all things people-related so our employees around the globe are empowered to do their best work. In Strategy, Planning & Analytics, we offer data-driven approaches (Culture Survey, Perf) to help find, develop, and retain people. In this role you will be creating, building, and driving the product roadmap to scale workforce insights to decision makers across Uber. Through this role, we want to centralize business ownership for our People Analytics products and platforms used across Uber such as Visier, Qualtrics, and our Network Analytics platform. You will be responsible for acting as the central voice for the product, driving product improvements, and working directly with the People Tech team to build, integrate, and scale our products. Ability to understand Uber’s businesses and how data can inform our people and strategic goals.Ability to translate strategic vision into actionable plans, synthesizing large data sets (e.g. employee database, qualitative and quantitative survey data) into executive summaries to build a compelling case for changeComprehensive understanding of people data sources, technology systems, and analytical methodsTechnical mentality, comfortable pressure testing analytics softwareSelf-starter attitude, you boldly pursue your work and love the responsibility of being personally empoweredCuriosity, you're innovative and creativeEmpathy, you understand our partners’ situations and are invested in their success.
